name: Google bar returns(install alternative script)
description:
** BROKEN!! INSTALL ALTERNATIVE SCRIPT **

Google updated their code, broke this style. I have another script, written in JavaScript, that's much more reliable than this one is, and ever could be. I could update this style, but I don't see a need to do so since it's so easy to break it... 

http://userscripts.org/scripts/show/179402

^^This^^ script add the Google bar on several Google pages. You can adjust the color, the links, and the bar position. In the future, I'll add even more options.
additional_info:
10-04-2013
-initial release
10-05-2013
-fixed a few bugs
10-06-2013
-rewrote style
-fixed bug for Drive, Calendar, and Plus layout
-fixed z-index issue
-fixed an issue of links clashing together on smaller resolutions
-should now work in every country (kinda hard to test)
10-07-2013
-added "images" link. 
-fixed layout issue with Google's older maps, edit event in calendar, and google groups
10-08-2013
-fixed layout issue with Google Voice
10-18-2013
-adjusted code to work with Google's recent change

If you come across something that needs to be adjusted please leave a comment or email ( JamesTGriffing.ii@gmail.com ) with the URL, and describe the issue. Thank you!
